TextBlock.Text: Nissi: We should begin this project at once. Ansi, is this neutron star usable, or will this project be bigger than I anticipated?
Anse: My calculations suggest that if we can redirect at least 92% of the star's output towards the planet, that would be enough for it to serve as a sun.

Nissi: Excellent, in that case we will begin with constructing <color=orange>a station at the L3 point</color> relative to this planet. Apprentice, I will put you in charge of completing this station.

Lachoncha: Excellent! I imagine it will need canons powerful enough to reach a low orbit around the star, meaning the energy required will force long cooldown times, so we should make sure that we can cycle multiple cannons to ensure the project completion-
Nissi: Easy, Apprentice. Remember, write it all out and keep it organized.
Navagio: If I may ask, would you include a small <color=orange>viewing platform</color>? I imagine the view from this station will be something to behold.
